segments.text: Hi , Bill . I saw you yesterday with a pretty girl .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , she is my favorite girl . I've decided to go steady with her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure she is the right girl ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . She is the ideal girl , the one I had dreamed of .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What type of girl is she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is the mature , stable , feminine type . I hope one day I can marry her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's great . You're serious this time .
segments.speaker: S1
